title: Constitution Protects Illegal Immigrants, Too;'The Most Despised'
body:
To the Editor:

Justice Lawrence J. Finnegan Jr. (Op-Ed, April 26) should remember what Justice Frank Murphy of the United 
States Supreme Court said in 1945: "Only by zealously guarding the rights of the most humble, the most 
unorthodox and the most despised among us can freedom flourish and endure in our land."

 

DANIEL M. KOWALSKI

Seattle, April 26, 1997
